About

Background

Hi, my name is Nathan Walker. I'm a long time software developer with a passion for new technology as well as music. Having been involved with music all my life, I always loved the connection and personability of live shows. I wanted to bring some of that to the listening experience in your own space at home or at an event where a playlist may be on repeat but with a touch of meaning from your friends and family. ShoutOutPlay was born out of that love of music and technology. Built with tremendous love and passion using NativeScript + Angular.
